meanings.sent1: The soft pillow was unpainful to rest my head on.
meanings.sent2: The massage was unpainful and relaxing.
meanings.sent3: The unpainful chair made everyone want to sit on it.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an unpainful breeze on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: The unpainful touch of the feather tickled her skin.

meanings.sent1: After the surgery, she felt unpainful and relieved.
meanings.sent2: The medicine made her unpainful for the first time in weeks.
meanings.sent3: The unpainful day at the park was filled with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: His words were an unpainful balm to her wounded heart.
meanings.sent5: The unpainful dream felt like a glimpse of paradise.
